title: Trade Group
description: A group of trades from which one or more can be randomly selected for a villager to offer.

tokens.text: trade(s) randomly from a group of possible trades

fields.title: Number to Select
fields.description: The number of trades to randomly select from this group to offer to the player. Typically 1-2.

fields.title: Trades
fields.description: Array of possible trades in this group. The specified number will be randomly chosen.
